oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Electrical Workers Organize #1
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Union Organization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Boss looking over worker's shoulder. Second Panel: Workers entering the Radio and Allied Trades Council. Third Panel: Radio Council leader telling members they refuse to disband.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
